actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to supply hydroelectric pumping energy at the Missouri Basin project pumping rate to irrigation projects in the Missouri River Basin which are constructed, operated, and maintained by irrigation districts organized under State law.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior, acting through the Bureau of Reclamation, to supply electric pumping energy to certain irrigation projects in the Missouri River Basin.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to supply hydroelectric pumping energy at the Missouri Basin project pumping rate to irrigation projects in the Missouri River Basin which are constructed, operated, and maintained by irrigation districts organized under State law.
